snippet: A Kansas man faces a first-degree murder charge after his 10-month-old foster daughter died when she was left in a hot car for more than two hours as outdoor temperatures reached about  90 degrees, officials said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Kansas Man Who Left Child in Hot Car Is Charged With Murder
headline.main: Kansas Man Who Left Child in Hot Car Is Charged With Murder

lead_paragraph: A Kansas man faces a first-degree murder charge after his 10-month-old foster daughter died when she was left in a hot car for more than two hours as outdoor temperatures reached about  90 degrees, officials said on Thursday.
